subject: Re: [junit] junit is not working after install
msgSnippet: C: Program Files Java jdk1.6.0_03 bin java -version java version 1.6.0_03 Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 1.6.0_03-b05) Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM
messageBody:
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin>java -version


java version "1.6.0_03"


Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 1.6.0_03-b05)


Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (build 1.6.0_03-b05, mixed mode,
sharing)


Thank you

I am trying to use junit as stand alone and follow book.

----- Original Message ----
From: mritunjay kumar <tinkukumarsinha@...>
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, January 2, 2008 2:59:55 AM
Subject: Re: [junit] junit is not working after install
















better to use eclipse and the junit jar to the bulid path .

pankaj khare <pankaj.0405@ gmail.com> wrote: follow this link

http://www.laliluna .de/assets/ tutorials/ junit-testing- en.pdf



On Jan 2, 2008 5:28 AM, Joel Neely <joel.neely@gmail. com> wrote:



> What do you get from the command:

>

> java -version

>

> ?

>

> -jn-

>

>

> On Jan 1, 2008 4:37 PM, wahoo.java <wahoo.java@yahoo. com<wahoo.java% 40yahoo.com> >

> wrote:

> >

> >

> >

> >

> >

> >

> > I am new to junit. I downloaded zip file and cannot get the

> > command: java -cp junit.jar junit,swingui. TestRunner

> >

> > I am following instructions from boob "Agile Java development"

> > by Anil Hemrajani as is on page 70.

> >

> > I set the classpath accordingly and I get java command not recognized.

> >

> > I cannot proceed in book because I cannot get the sample test to work.

> >

> >

>

> --

> Programming is the art of writing essays in crystal clear prose and

> making them execute. - Per Brinch Hansen

>

>
